New Records: Botswana secured their first win in the Africa Cup of Nations group stage.
Botswana scored their first goal in the 56th minute of the match.
Key Match Events: Botswana's late goal in the 79th minute proved decisive.
The match was tied 0-0 at halftime before Botswana took the lead.
Pre-Game Insights: Cape Verde were favorites on paper but struggled to convert chances.
Botswana's win was unexpected despite their form.
Post-Match Reflections: Botswana's coach praised the team's resilience after the comeback.
The win was a significant milestone for Botswana's national team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Francistown Stadium.
The scoreline was 1-0 in favor of Botswana.
Others: The match was part of the Africa Cup of Nations qualifying rounds.
Botswana's victory moved them closer to advancing to the next round.
